content.detailedDescription:
Jac & jade's ufo experience of 2003


posted: 10/7/2003

location: youngstown, oh

shape: sphere (12 in all)

duration:45 mins. plus

...Well, jade and i were walking in to a store when she said look at those balls in the sky,i looked where she had pointed in the sky and there they where! at first i thought they were hot air balloons, but as i watched them they did not move. as the clouds were going bye they (12 in all)sat there not moving. this lasted most of the sighting. a few planes went bye also.I thought that was strange....So we watched for a while longer,trying to guess what they were.
 then the most amazing thing happened,four of the balls started to move.The four of them came together below the others to form a square,then one left and went back into the group,as the three remaining formed a triangle,then the one that left came back and formed a rectangle.The most amazing thing i have ever seen! we watched for over 45 mins and they never left the sky where we were looking at.Looked like silver shiny balls in the sky. another lady and her daughter saw them also,i know i believe in ufo's now cause i used every possible thing it could be. airplanes move,hot air balloons can not sit in midair without moving with the wind,at least not 45 mins.
the clouds moved under them for they were very high in the sky. this happened in the middle of the day on a very windy day with very blue skies!Still tell this story today and am amazed with what we saw!

maybe the most prolific event ever,if we would have had a camera we would be rich...:)
also i want to add from what i saw...Either there are ufo's ...Or...Someone on the planet has a higher tech. than we ever imagined!
it is odd though...It was like they did this for us...A way of showing us
that we were watching. as we never looked away for over 45 mins.

truly amazed! and now a true believer...:)

jac & jade
content.summary: At first i thought they were hot air balloons, but as i watched them they did not move. as the clouds were going bye they (12 in all)sat there not moving. this lasted most of the sighting. a few planes went bye also.I thought that was strange....So we wat

content.detailedDescription: I went out outside to enjoy the weather on my back porch. i noticed what looked like a bird at about 10 degrees above the horizon. it was no bird as it didn't have wings and seemed to move much faster than a bird. it didn't change direction and otherwise didn't move. i thought it may be a plane but it didn't seem to make any noise before, during, or after. i couldn't grab a camera on time. the fact that it made no noise suggests to me it wasn't a plane or helicopter. i could tell for sure it moved faster than a commercial jet but resembles the speed of a fighter jet. it felt astonishing to witness. it seemed to be over 5 miles away moving south to north as i looked west. after ten seconds of observing, i lost sight of it due to trees and immediately wanted to know what it can be so i filed a report.
content.summary: Solid black object moving fast in a straight line without noise, apparent size made it look like a bird

content.detailedDescription:
The sky was clear blue on april 6, 2014.  i was outside meditating in the sun.  i decided to go inside the house, when i looked straight up and saw something stationary in the sky.  i watched for a few moments to see if the object was moving.  it was relatively stationary and i called my wife to have a look.  she came to the door and i pointed out the object to her and she quickly spotted the object.  i asked her to track the object and i retrieved two cameras, a nikon d3000 and a sony hd camcorder.  i first photographed the object with the nikon through a 55-200mm zoom lens at full 200mm zoom.  i got over 60 photographs with ease, as the object was hardly moving towards the north east.
after i photographed the object for the several shots, i turned on the camcorder.  the camcorder does not have an eye viewfinder, instead it uses an led monitor to see through the lens.  this makes spotting any object at a distance difficult when zooming in.  i did manage to capture glimpses of the object with the camcorder, however the photographs are the best capture.
i had been meditating earlier just to communicate with such objects and give thanks to the 'great spirit' for all the great spirit provides.  once i observed the object, i thanked the object for the visit and wished for further visits.  i humbly, respectfully with unconditional love, had requested a 'fly over' from the gfl.  the gfl has always honored my requests, and this is not the first request made to the gfl, it is just at this sighting, i was ready with camera(s) and conditions were clear.
the photographs i submit are three out of over 80 photographs.
content.summary: Yellow orb

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were at point dume state beach in malibu. we had hiked to the top to watch whales. we headed back down the trail right before sunset. when we got down to the beach, i took several pictures of the sunset. there were beautiful clouds and very bright white light was shining through. when i got home, i downloaded my pictures and was surprised to see that the light appeared to have structure to it. there were at least 8 other people also taking pictures that night.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset and this looked like bright white light shining through the clouds. when i looked at the pictures, i was surprised to see that it was a structure with lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my daughter in my car when i saw the moon reflecting in my window. then the moon moved across the width of the sky (no sound). i was amazed. when my 15 year old daughter came out i asked her to look up and she said "whats that?" i was not drinking or under the influence of any legal or otherwise substances. when i looked more closely i could tell it was large as the moon but a little oval like an egg. the moon was behind grey clouds. then a plane flew underneath the object which gave me better perspective of its size. the plane was like a pen pin point next to a person. also the plane looked like it was flying at turtle pace compared to speed of object  huge. i was driving towards north and i could see it move from one size of the sky to the other no zig zags just straight. i called the county non-emergency # to ask if the local army was doing drills, they said no. i asked if there was a promotional spotlight in town (it didn't look like a spotlight but i wanted to make sure), they said no.
content.summary: Was not a believer in ufo, am very skeptical and suspicious but after seeing the speed of the object made me a believer.

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to film a star to see if i could pick it up on my phone. i then zoomed in 100% and saw flashing colors. i kept filming multiple videos for a few minutes. the neighbors a couple houses away were out smoking cigarettes. i didn't notice them speaking audibly. i was continuing to film to see colors and patterns, then my world went "silent". everything around me was still and seemed a little odd. i was still filming. at that time i was under a street light, but the area we live in is near the woods and was still dark enough to see stars brightly. i couldn't pick anything up on my phone's camcorder. i even tried to see if i could get the street light in view, nothing showed up. this time was when i heard the whispers. i stopped filming to focus and observe what was going on around me. i then felt a strange sense of confusion. i was completely calm before, and had no reason to be confused until i took my attention away from the sky. i felt out of body slightly and like something i couldn't explain happened. the only words i could give to it are confusion both mentally and physicallly. i tried to start filming again, but felt a sensation that told me it wasn't a good idea and to go back in the house. i sat down on the couch once inside and looked to see what i caught. the video that i was originally out to film was there. as well as an entirely unexplained one. the video was of a subtle j shape of orbs lit red and white. i don't remember seeing anything like that. i put the video on stereo volume and could hear a low vibration sound, as well as chimes and beeps. the beeps are from a fire detector with low batteries. thefirst couple times i listened to the sounds closely, i could hear the whispers, but no make out of words. after a few times of viewing the video, i can't sense them anymore. i wasn't scared during my time in contact. there was no sense of panic, or malevolence.
content.summary: Trying to film a star like ship, caught something else

content.detailedDescription: First time i noticed the object was at early dawn and no stars were visible. i took photos and saw objects in photos that i did not notice with my eyes. now, i look for the object(s) at dusk and later and then early dawn and, unless it is raining or really foggy or cloudy, i see the object(s) just about every morning and evening. sometimes i have seen the object(s) as late as 9:00 a.M. i am fully aware that no aircraft of any type are flying in the area. my personal opinion is that this is a ufo, nothing conventional. the sighting is obvious and then it disappears, since i have no idea of how far away they really are from me.
content.summary: Appears usually at dusk or dawn for short time and some times stays longer

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:05 pm on sunday april 6th, i was on our front porch with my brother having a cigarette.  i noticed through the corner of my eye a bright light appeared near the constellation orion.  i noticed it was moving in an easterly trajectory and told my brother to come take a look.  we moved onto our front lawn and witnessed the obect (bright star like object)continue to move easterly and then it started to change its course in a smoooth manner and head north east.  no beacon lights, no strobes, no navigation lights and i did not hear jet noise nor piston noise from a ga aircraft.  this object moved about 75 miles in less than 2 minutes.  i noticed as the obect was directly under the moon (looking to see a shadow shape to no avail)i noticed a slight very small contrail that was only about 5x the size of the light trail behind it.
content.summary: Bright star light like object from the west moved quickly with no sound and moved ne.

content.detailedDescription: I was over on first and nees in fresno california i was driving home from the store and me and my friend saw this red and blue light in the sky we thought it could of been a helicopter but it looked quite different so we parked off on this trail by millbrook and nees to get out and look the object was looking as if it was morphing into itself going in a circle almost by st agnes hospital it was going back and fourth and in all kinds of directions there were a few people outside their houses as well watching when we were getting closer by walking i heard some sort of a twirling engine sound sounded like air moving really fast and pressurized and it had to have saw me and my friend when we were walking probably unsafly close to it, it came towards us quick it got about 300 ft away from us in the air almost directly over us as we were walking really fast in the other direction now and it stalled for a little when we did that and went back about 200 ft it was hiding behind the only big trees in the neighborhood probably around a football feild tall. it was also acending and decending at one point it got way too low to see almost looked as if landed(in full neighboorhood would probably be hard) so me and my friend ran back to my car to go drive and see where it was and could not find it at all. we were looking at this craft jump back and fourth for about 5-10 minutes before it dissapeard. it was very close the whole time, not good vibes from it at all almost seemed as if it was looking for something. this object seemed to have way to good of control of its craft, i seen another post in fresno with a ufo that looks highly alike and very recent, weird. one photo is an close up of ther other, can almost see full craft.
content.summary: Red & blue lights twisting in one another and coming close.

content.detailedDescription:
since i'd made a report of my last sightings from 3/23/14(which was devastating to me); i decided to continue observing the skies(you never know, right?). so, on 4/6/14 i'd set my video camera up at around 1300 hrs, while at my father's home; just north of town, about 7 miles, and within the first 18 minutes of the 29 minute video, i'd noticed a dark saucer-shaped object moving across my screen from west(moving slightly downward, at a speed that, like the others i'd caught on video, could not be seen with video at "full speed".  
  it took approximately another 1 minute, and another object; which appeared to be dark in color as well; but seemed to have more of a pointed front end, appeared from the western sky, slightly lower on the screen, but also moved at once again, a speed that couldn't be seen at full speed.  it took several more minutes; then once again, higher in the sky(within the clouds), at least 3,000 ft(considering the type of clouds); moving from west to east as well...Also at to fast of a speed to see @ full speed.  no more sightings for the remainder of the video.  the video camera was set up on my tri-pod, outside, and was not disturbed until the filming was complete.

i've attached a video clip of the 3rd object sighted; along with stills taken from the video; of all 3 objects.  i wasn't sure if the second object was ours or not, but with video at full speed, it appeared as a flash...So, i'm thinking not.

i'm hoping for disclosure very soon; as we(public), have a right to know the truth!

thanks once again,

kh
content.summary: Facing video camera to north sky @ a 45 degree angle; and observed total of 3 dark saucer-shaped crafts coming from west, and moving east very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and was doing something in the laundry about 1.30am and while i was doing things,i hear little vibrations though the walls as if there was a police helicopter approaching from a far and this came on and off  for  about 10 mins  around after 10 mins the vibrations got a bit more strong and the same time an electricity feeling came on to me head down to my toes it,as if it felt like the electricity was pulsating or like how a heart beat beats this happened for 5 mins and the electricity feeling was gone and the vibrations got stronger and as i look up the window i saw the tip of the craft, as i saw more of it, i quickly turned the laundry lights off to get a better view of it, as it come pass a bit more i so as if it was or almost hit the roof, i saw the surface of the craft it look like it was made of've a huge rocks that are look like in row of grids, and on some of the grids it look like it had those modern key chain led lights on it, and near the tip of the start of the triangle on the side it had some sort of writing,a sentence of it and it look like, kind of've summerian or egyptian writing, as if u can read it from left to right or right to left, and next to the writings on each grid blocks it had animal pictures on it. it look like it had an eagle or falcon,tri ceratops, stegasouros, a wolly mamoth, buffalo or water buffalo and the end of it, it had look like a fish or the star sign of pieces on it, as i was watching it hoovering slowly pass the house and look like it was venting small steams on sides and under neath of it, and under the craft it had look like a huge bright white doom thing under in the middle of the craft with two smaller one's next to it, as it comes pass and saw the back of it and look like it had some sort of small scafolding and on it, it look like it had series of different lights colors on it,as i kept watching i saw look like the olden day police or ambulance siren light comes on, as i keep watching it look a huge person standing next and against the scafolding, im not sure if it look down on me as if i saw his helmet opened up to expose the face and as that happened it look liked it started ascending up slowly, as it ascends slowly up, i tried to wake my mum up, as walk pass the kitchen and lounge room it felt like only half of the house vibrating loud as if there was an earthquake, and i got to my mums rooms to wake her up and come back in to the laundry and outside the balcony didnt see anything else as if it never happened or it some time time ago. and on my birthday last year on the 11th of march i had a feeling or urge to come outside, and i went outside i saw look like a silver or bright white light orb maybe the size of a 4x4 car or a decent camper trailer hoovering , bouncing around and look like it was lost or looking for something, thank you for listening.


and kind regards
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A triangular ufo with patterns around and it the surface look like made of some sort of rock

content.detailedDescription: I was going to close the door and go to bed.  about 11"30pm.  i lived on the delaware river at the time.  there were about 20 rays shining into the water in a circular pattern.  there was no sound,after about,less than a minute it was gone. what ever it was was hovering over the water.  about a year later i saw it again in the same spot.I  never saw any type of craft because of the brightness of the lights. i shut my door and grabbed my shot gun.Cannot  give a color,it was pitch dark
content.summary: I was living on the delaware river (foul rift road]} it was summer time,about 11:30pm.  i went to close the door when i saw a circle of lights hovering over the water.  her was no noise just app.20 rays of light shining into the warer  all of a sudden the

content.detailedDescription: i wrote about this for my english 2010 class paper i am doing research on and i attached the file to this page. its called jessie's park
content.summary: I saw a ufo when i was a young man, hovering above the police station in roy, ut

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my garage and from out of no where a feeling that i really needed to go out side came over me.I could not help my self but to go out and survey the out side of the garage for some reason.As soon as i got out side i saw a huge glowing craft so low that it nearly hit the roof of the garage.It was clearly an structured vehicle.It looked like it was metallic but at the same time it was changing several very brillant colors of orange, red, and yellows, they were they brightest colors that i have ever seen.The craft stayed just above the roof of my garage slightly changing it's position and flying around for at least 15 minutes before a very large dark looking helicopter with very bright spot lights came into the area.It also was almost so low as to hit the roof of my garage and it was very loud.But the worst part is that ever since this happened i have been being followed by helicopters that are all flat black with no markings except for small yellow numbers under the main rotor shaft.I am not imagining these helicopters.I have whitnesses, both me and my brother went to a local hobby store early this morning and when we came out there was one of these black helicopters  hovering in the parking lot just above the building.Me, my brother and the people in the helicopter just looked at each other for at least 3 or 4 minutes before they very slowly moved away.During the ufo event my cell phone would not work, a brand new battery in my car died, and the time on my watch, on the clock on the wall in the garage, and the clock in my car were all off by 45 minutes compared to the actuall time.
content.summary: While i was working in my garage i suddenly started feeling like i really needed to go out side and check the outside of the garage for some reason .As soo as i got outside my garage door i saw a huge glowing object hovering above almost low enough to hit

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if this was 1952 or 1953. the date was july 1,2 or 3rd for sure. i was walking to the local store to get a loaf of bread. happened to look up for no special reason and saw 3 dime sized aluminum colored discs traveling due north. no sound .No con trail. no variation in speed. first observed when they were about 70 degrees above the southern horizon. the discs continued north and eventually blended into one red ball or dot. this took about 3 to 5 minutes from start to finish. i was 12 or 13 years old at the time and took a lot of "guff" from people that i mentioned this event to. 
years later i read a small article in the detroit news about a woman on the east side of detroit that told of the exact same sighting fading into a red ball on the same date and time.
content.summary: Clear sky . no clouds. 3 discs dime size. travel straight line south to north

content.detailedDescription: Large orange ball
content.summary: Large orange ball

content.detailedDescription: I was sunning myself when i noticed in the clear blue skies an cigar/cylindrical object high in the sky travelling in a straight line towards me in a westerly fashion. it was very high in the sky, not as high as commercial aircraft but approxiametly height of civilian aircraft would fly in my opinion. it was dark grey/black in colour with no discrenable external features. at first i thought it was a recreational aircraft but the motion was too fast to be an aircraft. the next thing that came to mind was a large bird flying but the elevation was too high and object was too big to be a bird. after observing the object for about 20-30 seconds, it made a perfect 90 degree turn to the south. it did not bank into a turn like a aircraft or a bird would do....It was a perfect turn that happened in an instant. the object then travelled in an exact straight line going south for about another 15-20 seconds.The object then made another perfect 90 degree turn back towards the east where it appeared from. i observed it for the next 30-40 seconds travelling in a straight line easterly until it faded from my sight. i had to shake my head a few times to make sure that i was seeing what i was seeing but it is exactly how i described it. in no way was the object a plane helicopter or bird. it was something unexplained. i felt that it was nothing in this world that i have ever seen. the object maintained its shape and colour throughout the encounter.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo that made two sharp 90 degree turns then faded away

content.detailedDescription: Sent to me by my brother in law.
content.summary: Brother in law witness and photographed . shenandoah valley, virginia.

content.detailedDescription: Just past midnight april 7, 2014. i was as usual, standing on the 2nd floor balcony/walkway right outside my front door. i star and sky gaze. noticing something coming from the right(west) and alignment with the length of the condo building amazed me.  as it got closer i saw and counted three(3) white lights on each point, of what appeared to be a triangle. one (1) red light was located in the middle of the three lights of the triangle. red light pulsated - not fast, it went  on... off... on... off...   it was close and over-head. if it were flying higher or more over the building i could not have spotted it. it continued moving in a straight line and then turned and went south proceeding over the gulf. i watched until it was out-of-sight. a sketch was sent via text and email to lechner - mufon. a powerful experience that gave me the chills and i felt that whatever hair was on my body was standing on end.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle. three 3)

content.detailedDescription: Noticed object after looking at photos
content.summary: Noticed only after viewing pictures was taking of sunset

content.detailedDescription: What i am reporting are two earth anomalies that i spotted on goggle earth. they are very strange, please if you could shed any light on what they are i would appreciate it. the first anomaly is located off the south coast of puerto rico. goggle earth describes it as the muertos trough, although to me it looks artificial with it's 90 degree angles and just the over all weirdness of it is incredible. also as you follow it the definition of the anomaly starts to blur into lighter shades, until it reaches a point where it turns at a fuzzy 90 degree angle going north. this area by goggle is called turner hole canyon and then just after passing shepard canyon island you will notice a perfectly straight line running across the anomaly zoom in on it. what is all this, above that the anomaly does two more fuzzy 90 degree turns. it then stops where the british virgin islands are. the second goggle earth anomaly is at the bottom north west base of mt. hermon almost in line with the un base at the top of the mountain. you will notice a huge mound or hill there with the top indented, and just north and east of it at it's base you will notice a black rectangular object be sure to zoom in for clear view. what is this ?
content.summary: Earth anomalies i believe have ufo inplecations

content.detailedDescription: Exact day and can be pin-pointed, but i thought i would go ahead and share what my wife and i experienced on a carnival cruise back in july of 2007. we were on the carnival glory and had left grand cayman island headed for jamaica. our room was on the starboard side of the ship, near the top by the spa. it has no balcony, but instead was a floor to ceiling window. really nice. we have two young children and my wife didn't want them crawling over the balcony railing, that and we operate on a shoe-string budget. anyway, about 3 or 4 in the morning i woke up and was looking out the window at a beautiful lightning storm we were sailing through. i noticed my wife was also awake. so we laid there just watching the storm, when out of the semi-darkness, three equally spaced teal green lights emerged headed straight for the ship. they were pretty low on the horizon, and moving at a normal speed for plane or perhaps a jet. all of a sudden the lights started zipping around each other like an aerobatic show unlike any i have ever seen. twisting around each other. headeded vertically and horizontally, like some kind of roller coaster. they all operated independent of each other. i got up out of bed and went to the window/wall. i asked my wife if she was seeing this too, which she said she did. after they disappeared, i went outside in the rain and lightning to see if i could see them, which i couldn't.  so i went back inside and got my video camera out and messed with the focus and night vision. i stayed up the rest of the early morning hours laying in wait for them to return. they never returned. and i remember thinking that my life would never be the same. these lights were not like anything i have ever seen. there is no way for manned aircraft to perform the way they did. the thing that got me really excited, was the famous video from haiti. at the end of the clip, there are bluish green lights zipping upward. they resemble what we saw almost exactly. when i saw the video i was very excited. the video shows the craft in great detail. i didn't see the craft. just the lights. however, that video was proven to be fake, but it came from the same area. i wonder if it is possible that it was made fake to cover up something. anyway, that is what we witnessed. also, we don't use drugs and haven't ever experimented with drugs.
content.summary: Three lights moving in an unbelievable manner

content.detailedDescription:
It looked similar to a modern aircraft but it wasn't moving...It was hovering very low and had bright lights.

a convoy just then passed us on the highway and we thought it was related. the first car had a red flashing light stuck on its hood. following it was a large bus (extra tall) that had flashing lights and said "new york dept of financial insurance". they were driving very fast, at least 95 mph.

the flying object had 3 white flood lights and one red light underneath. it wasn't triangular but looked similar to like a military plane?  it wasn't moving forward or backward...It was just staying in place.
content.summary: It looked similar to a modern aircraft but it wasn't moving...It was hovering very low and had bright lights.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11pm, i stepped out into my back yard to take the dogs out to do their business.  i live in a community that it very close to, due west of the texas motor speedway.  i looked in the direction of tms and noticed, at least, a dozen red lights moving from east to west, very slowly, and by my estimation, flying directly over the tms.  as they moved closer, the red lights faded out, completely.  at first, i thought they were disappearing into the clouds, but i witnessed several fade where there were no clouds to obscure them.  i took my dogs back inside and put on a jacket (it was cold) and came back out.  there were now another dozen, or so red lights, moving in the same path as the first ones i saw.  they, too, faded and became virtually invisible at about a 45-50 degree angle from my vantage point.  i tried filming them on my phone camera, as well, and did get some of the lights, but they just look like lights.  anyway, i began to scan above me and to my right to see if i could spot them without lights. at this point, the low hanging clouds were lit up from the neighborhood street lights and i spotted the dark underside (unlit) of a disk shaped object as it flew silently, and very low, in a continued path to the west.  as it faded out of view, i spun back towards the speedway to see that the red lights continued to show up and along the same description as the other 'waves'.  i continued to visually scan all around me and spotted to other moving objects.  one was disk shaped, much like the first on i spotted, but much higher. i saw this one through a break in the clouds and it was kind of glowing dimly and white.  the third object was the oddest. it was dark and i could only see it because of the light on the clouds (like the first one), but this one was very close and descending into what i would guess to be one block over.  this object was square in shape any perfectly silent.  i did not see it ascend, at all.  i could not get to the location as the houses in the neighborhood share fences where our back yards all meet.  i was afraid i would miss it if i tried to circle the block.  there were several more lights, fading red to invisible, but they eventually stopped showing up in the skies.  i'm guessing that i was outside witnessing this for nearly 2 hours.

i should note that there are several airports nearby and very frequent air traffic, as a result.  the planes are a regular enough occurace that there are almost always planes in the air.  however, they are easily identified, very visible, and the sounds that go along with them are also heard all the time.  i even saw several planes during this event that i'm almost certain would have seen these objects, too.

the objects that witnessed made no sounds at any time.  they never blinked, made sudden movements, but obviously under intelligent control.  the recordings on my phone do not catch any "smoking gun" footage, but you can definitely hear my voice shaking in awe and nervousness as i tried to catch them.  all considered,between lights and the three more solid appearing objects, i estimate that i saw between 30 and 50!

i have been scouring the internet for the past two days looking for other witnesses to this, with no luck so far.
content.summary: Fleet sighting during nascar race, in my back yard. starte as red lights, turned into multiple, unlit objects

content.detailedDescription: Ufo abserved about midnight about march 1966 while looking out beedroom window, three bright lights formed a triangle, i observed it for a few minutes during the time i was watching it it remained statinary then abruptly disapeared. the next day there was reports in the newspaper that one or more ufos were sighted around dexter mi, which is in the area of ann arbor. i was not sure what the lights were at the time but im confident that it was not an airplane. i felt no fear when i saw it, and i was curious. i wondered what it was and watched it then i went back to bed.
content.summary: Ufo observed about midnight about march 1966 while looking out bedroom window observed three bright lights that formed triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I was on patrol at a housing addition where i work as a security guard, and i proceeded to the most northern side of the housing area. in the back, or north side of this housing addition, there is a "lagoon" or cul de sac with no houses around this area, it is the only area that has yet to have houses built, so with no yard lights around either, it is an ideal place for illegal activity and a priority for monitoring the residential area from a view. a few feet from this cul de sac, there is a field (this whole housing area is surrounded by fields on the north and west side.) and the only entrance is visible and car lights absolutly could not be missed if entered.

as i began to make a drive through this cul de sac, or lagoon, which is what it is nicknamed by the other security guard and myself, i noticed around 150 yards away there where 4 to 6 bluish, cool colored, lights. at first they appeared as flash lights from the way they were moving, they looked like they were being controlled by the person(s) who where in control of them. then, as i stopped and really studied what i was actually seeing, they appeared to skip and jump in flashes, and a few of them flicker and pulse like a flame would.  at that time, i called the local police department and advised dispatch that there where people in this field with flashlights, because it could have been the only logical explanation at that time. due to the fear of break-ins, i take no chances with guesses anyway.

as soon as i hung up with this dispatcher, (i have a radio in my unit that stays on "scan" and picks up all local county radio traffic) she had called one of the officers via pd radio traffic. i then, pulled out my personal cell phone, which is outdated with poor video quality and has exceeded phone memory, and began video recording and managed to capture 18 seconds of these lights exceeding the remaining memory. 

as soon as my phone stopped recording, i then turned around and proceeded to the area of the housing that was closest to these lights. in order to leave the cul de sac, i would have to travel east-southeast bound which would be away from where the lights had appeared. i then turned and proceeded westbound on one of the streets. i attempted to visually locate these lights, and was fast approaching the area, and you guessed it, these lights had dissapeared. so i immediatly stopped my vehicle and turned around and drove straight to the cul de sac, again, hoping i would see them. these lights have never been seen again. myself and a pd officer both used our unit lights to try and locate what was out there. when i told him what i had witnessed, this officer raised his eyebrows with a smile, and that expression reassured me, my witnessed story wasnt normal. he told me he would look around the entrance to this field, and that night he never radioed anything about this field or the entrance. 

this area has no type of traffic and is actully hard to get to. i never heard noises associated with these lights, that i could hear, nor seen anyone walking, and c'mon, for that amount of lights that i had seen, there wouldve been some type of contact made with the party and many people involved. i have never went and ivestigated where these lights where as of yet, due to my job and its policies and i will say this: i have no reputation to lose nor any gain with this testimony. i have seen many things growing up in a rural area, and this experience is another one added, but with evidence! thank you!

note: in the video at 0:00 pause it and you will see the back of the housing with yardlights and to the far left, you will see the lights. i apoligize again for the poor quality.
content.summary: Ufo with flickering, and pulsing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was intending to take my own picture, but after several days i looked over the photo, i just noticed the strange thing came out on the background of my photo. i don't know what is it and during the time i took that photo, i don't think i hear any noise
content.summary: I was intending to take my own picture, but after several days i looked over the photo, i just noticed the strange thing came out on my photo.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is an almost duplicate of one made in feb-early march. i have
witnessed it over a couple month's now. same place same time of night. but, not always. the nights are clear and there were no mitigating circumstances. i now watch each night as i let my dogs out to do their stuff.I feel if it were a natural penom. or a star, it would always show up on the clear nights. 

 i would like to know, how can i give a more accurate description of my observations. maybe i should keep a log documenting each days observation.
content.summary: This sighting is a recurrent one.It's not always there.

content.detailedDescription: We were having breakfast in our backyard & we saw a craft shoot down at an angle from the north. it was making turns in the air. the craft had reflective type of material. i grabbed my camera & took pictures. the craft had turned & showed an octagon side with big circle lights & they flashed 3 times. it was in the air traveling really slow in the same spot for 15 mins then traveled north.
content.summary: Reflective type of material craft. strange shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with my son when we first saw 2 orange objects near the horizon.  we kept driving but as we watched them they were heading in our direction and i noticed they had no flashing lights like other aircraft.  just a solid orange glow and were relatively large.

i stopped the car to get a closer look.  by this time i could only see one of the objects.  it was a flying orange glowing orb.  it flew directly above me on a straight, purposeful path.  it made no sound.

it was not something floating (like a balloon or lantern), i felt it was definitely flying because of the speed, trajectory (straight across the sky like a plane, not rising like a balloon) and steadiness.

when the first one was about out of site as it continued flying away from me, a second one came along almost the exact same path and with the same characteristics.  it flew almost right over me.  i have mobile phone video of this, but the video only looks like a small orange light buzzing around (at least you can see there are no flashing lights like an airplane, just a glow).

again, when that second one was almost out of sight as it flew away, a 3rd one was then flying along the exact same path.

i'm over 50 years old and this did not look like any other flying craft (e.G. airplane, helicopter, floating balloon) i have seen in my life.  it was not floating like a balloon, it was flying.  it appeared be a glowing orb, with orange, slightly pulsating light.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 glowing orange orbs fly in a straight line directly overhead in a steady direction, one after another with about 30 seconds between them.
